posts.name: Shivansh Pande
posts.cooked:
Good Morning @carlton Sir,
Just wanted to clarify, what is the syllabus for End Term Exam of TDS? Also, what kind of questions appear, theoretical, numerical, or ROE-like, meaning anything from anywhere on the internet?
Thank You Sir.

posts.name: Carlton D'Silva
posts.cooked:
1. Syllabus: All 9 modules, All videos
  2. Weightage: Roughly equal weightage for all 9 modules
  3. Questions: Between 40 to 60 questions
  4. Exam time: 1.5 hours
  5. Questions will be all brand new set. None from previous PYQs.

Kind regards

link_counts.title: Guidance for End Term Preparation Requested
